the-daily-chase.description: My long running home on the internet. Started as a WordPress blog in 2013 and has evolved through many versions into a place to document what I'm building, learning, and thinking about.

visitmariemont.description: An interactive itinerary builder I use to plan personalized visits for friends and family coming to town. Restaurants, walks, coffee, and the perfect day mapped out.

potofhugga.description: A St. Patrick's Day scavenger hunt experience at Hugga Retreats. Guests explore the trails, solve clues, and hunt for hidden gold across the property.

hugga.description: Hugga internal team app for turnovers, QA, and guest feedback.

NCLLC-Viggo.description: Automated guest messaging agent for Hugga Retreats. Handles inbound Hostfully messages and drafts responses.

hugga-picklelodge-partnership.description: Partnership between Hugga and The Pickle Lodge to cross-promote both brands and reach each other's customer base.
